00033 //! Graph widget with internal data sets. The data can be saved as a text file.
00034 //! \sa XQGraph, XGraph
00035 class XWaveNGraph : public XNode
00036 {
00037     XNODE_OBJECT
00038 protected:
00039  XWaveNGraph(const char *name, bool runtime, FrmGraphNURL *item);
00040  XWaveNGraph(const char *name, bool runtime, 
00041              XQGraph *graphwidget, KUrlRequester *urlreq, QPushButton *btndump);
00042 public:
00043  virtual ~XWaveNGraph();
00044  
00045  void setRowCount(unsigned int rowcnt);
00046  void setColCount(unsigned int colcnt, const char **lables);
00047  void setLabel(unsigned int col, const char *label);
00048  void insertPlot(const XString &label,
00049     int colx = 0, int coly1 = 1, int coly2 = -1, int colweight = -1, int colz = -1);
00050  void clearPlots();
00051  unsigned int numPlots() const {return m_plots.size();}
00052  
00053  unsigned int rowCount() const;
00054  unsigned int colCount() const;
00055  double *cols(unsigned int n);
00056  
00057  //! clear all data points
00058  void clear();
00059  
00060  void readLock() const;
00061  void readUnlock() const;
00062  //! now allow user to access data
00063  void writeLock();
00064  //! unlock and update graph
00065  void writeUnlock(bool updategraph = true);
00066  
00067  //! \arg plotnum start with zero.
00068  int colX(unsigned int plotnum) const {return m_plots[plotnum].colx;}
00069  //! \arg plotnum start with zero.
00070  int colY1(unsigned int plotnum) const {return m_plots[plotnum].coly1;}
00071  //! \arg plotnum start with zero.
00072  int colY2(unsigned int plotnum) const {return m_plots[plotnum].coly2;}
00073  //! \arg plotnum start with zero.
00074  int colWeight(unsigned int plotnum) const {return m_plots[plotnum].colweight;}
00075  //! \arg plotnum start with zero.
00076  int colZ(unsigned int plotnum) const {return m_plots[plotnum].colz;}
00077  
00078  const shared_ptr<XGraph> &graph() const {return m_graph;}
00079  //! \arg plotnum start with zero.
00080  const shared_ptr<XXYPlot> &plot(unsigned int plotnum) const {return m_plots[plotnum].xyplot;}
00081  const shared_ptr<XAxis> &axisx() const {return m_axisx;}  
00082  const shared_ptr<XAxis> &axisy() const {return m_axisy;}  
00083  const shared_ptr<XAxis> &axisy2() const {return m_axisy2;}  
00084  const shared_ptr<XAxis> &axisz() const {return m_axisz;}  
00085  const shared_ptr<XAxis> &axisw() const {return m_axisw;}  
00086  const shared_ptr<XNode> &dump() const {return m_dump;}
00087  const shared_ptr<XStringNode> &filename() const {return m_filename;}
00088 private:
00089  XRecursiveRWLock m_mutex;
00090  unsigned int m_colcnt;
00091  std::vector<XString> m_labels;
00092  std::vector<double> m_cols;
00093  
00094  void init();
00095  void drawGraph();
00096  
00097  QPushButton *const m_btnDump;
00098  
00099  const shared_ptr<XGraph> m_graph;
00100  struct Plot {
00101     shared_ptr<XXYPlot> xyplot;
00102     int colx, coly1, coly2, colweight, colz;
00103  };
00104  int m_colw;
00105  std::deque<Plot> m_plots;
00106  shared_ptr<XAxis> m_axisx, m_axisy, m_axisy2, m_axisw, m_axisz;
00107  
00108  const shared_ptr<XNode> m_dump;
00109  const shared_ptr<XStringNode> m_filename;
00110  
00111  shared_ptr<XListener> m_lsnOnDumpTouched, m_lsnOnFilenameChanged, m_lsnOnIconChanged;
00112  XTalker<bool> m_tlkOnIconChanged;
00113  
00114  void onDumpTouched(const shared_ptr<XNode> &);
00115  void onFilenameChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &);
00116  void onIconChanged(const bool &);
00117

00119  XMutex m_filemutex;
00120  
00121  xqcon_ptr m_conFilename, m_conDump;
